engItems.name: PORK TENDERLOIN PLANK STEAK
engItems.description: Duchesse potatoes, a red wine reduction, béarnaise, and fried vegetables

engItems.name: BIFF RYDBERG
engItems.description: Diced beef tenderloin, potatoes, and onion, served with dijon mustard and raw egg yolk

engItems.name: SPICY CHEESEBURGER
engItems.description: 180-gram prime rib burger with lettuce, tomato, pickled red onion, cheddar cheese with jalapeños, and barbecue sauce in brioche bread with fries and smokey ranch aioli

engItems.name: HALLOUMI BURGER
engItems.description: Lettuce, tomato, red onion, and guacamole in brioche bread with fries and aioli

engItems.name: FISH'N CHIPS
engItems.description: "Beer-batter" breaded cod loins with dill aioli, seared lemon, and fries

engItems.name: HUSETS SCHNITZEL
engItems.description: 200 grams of meat "Borås biggest" served with lemon, capers, anchovy, herb butter, and a red wine reduction with fried potatoes

engItems.name: CAESAR SALAD
engItems.description: Grilled chicken, bacon, croutons, parmesan, and Caesar dressing

engItems.name: SALMON SALAD WITH QUINOA
engItems.description: Grilled salmon with quinoa, cocktail tomatoes, julienne carrot, mixed salad, red onion with vinaigrette

engItems.name: CREAMY CHICKEN PASTA
engItems.description: Sundried tomatoes, basil, vegetables, and parmesan

engItems.name: MUSSELS ÁL CAVA
engItems.description: Steamed mussels in a creamy cava sauce, topped with cream fraîche and jalapeños, served with fries and aioli

engItems.name: GRILLED BEEF TENDERLOIN
